title: Asparagus quiche with prosciutto
ingredients: ['600g asparagus, cut in bite-sized pieces', '1/2 packet frozen puff pastry, thawed', '125g mozzarella cheese, diced', '125g prosciutto, cut into fine strips', '3 eggs', '250ml single cream', '2 to 3 tablespoons dry white wine', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper']
